title: Repetitive strain injuries at work
creator_credit: Open Channel Productions and Kim Dalton
brief_description: A documentary that examines the reasons for repetitive strain injuries and discusses the symptoms and treatment of RSI. Sufferers describe the activities which led to their injuries and doctors talk about methods of prevention.
description: A documentary that examines the reasons for repetitive strain injuries and discusses the symptoms and treatment of RSI. Sufferers describe the activities which led to their injuries and doctors talk about methods of prevention.
